newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Dentsply buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Dentsply buy repeated.

text.p: Barrington Research Inc said Friday it maintained its buy rating on Dentsply International Inc, adding it would become a more aggressive buyer if the stock weakened further.

-- Dentsply shares fell 3-7/8 at 48-1/4 after the company said Thursday it expected to post second-quarter earnings of about $0.66 a share, equal to a year ago. Barrington said the consensus had been around $0.75 a share.
-- Strong results are expected in the third and fourth quarters, Barrington said.

-- Dentsply, which makes x-ray equipment, said its second-quarter earnings would show no growth because of the cost of relocating its Preventive Care division's manufacturing facilities to a new plant in York, Pa. It also cited the recent acquisition of New Image Industries and the negative impact of a strong U.S. dollar on sales in European currencies.

-- "While the company admits some of the problems were the result of management lapses, we find the explanation for the shortfalls reasonable and temporary in nature, and the long-term outlook remains very positive for this high-quality growth company," Barrington said.
